storyInfo: W, Hoederer, and the others defend the Lifebone crash site, but W's mercenaries vanish in the unfamiliar environment. While searching for them, W and her team are attacked by strange monsters.

attributes.content: Abandoned Mansion, Londinium Outskirts
Is she back?
attributes.name: Nervous Soldier

attributes.content: Not yet.
attributes.name: Unhappy Soldier

attributes.content: Damn, it was hard enough dodging those devils. How did she survive and even find us—
attributes.name: Nervous Soldier

attributes.content: How the heck did she know that I did business with the devils?
attributes.name: Nervous Soldier

attributes.content: Well, consider that business deal lost.
attributes.name: Unhappy Soldier

attributes.content: What about you? How'd she get you?
attributes.name: Nervous Soldier

attributes.content: She held a crossbow to my head.
attributes.name: Unhappy Soldier

attributes.content: I knew her from before. She didn't used to be so—
attributes.name: Unhappy Soldier

attributes.content: Didn't used to be so what?
Go on.
Er, no, I didn't—
attributes.name: Unhappy Soldier

attributes.content: The soldier, who has served the dukes all his life, lies on the ground, a crossbow pointed at his forehead.
The voice of the one holding the crossbow is cold as ice.
I'm waiting.
I just—s-sorry, Millscar!
attributes.name: Terrified Soldier
Terrified Soldier
attributes.content: I-I shouldn't have—

attributes.name: Terrified Soldier
attributes.content: Aaaahh!
The bolt pierces his ear.
Some people punch holes in their pets' ears as a sign of ownership.
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: A man is not a pet, of course... but sometimes they're not so different, are they?
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: Now get back up and give me a status report.
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: Have you done what I've asked of you?
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: Y-Yes, ma'am!
attributes.name: Terrified Soldier

attributes.content: W-well, the reception at the monitoring station was really bad, so even though we tried to gather as much information as possible—
attributes.name: Terrified Soldier

attributes.content: Skip to the conclusion.
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: Based on what little information the Trilby Asher left behind, and the occasional intercepted comms, we can confirm that a unit called 'the Exemplars' has been formed, and its leader is most likely the one you spoke of...
attributes.name: Terrified Soldier

attributes.content: 'Vina'.
attributes.name: Terrified Soldier

attributes.content: They seem to be headed for the front at Silverrock Bluffs.
attributes.name: Terrified Soldier

attributes.content: Silverrock Bluffs. They're really staying in this war.
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: Keep at it. Notify me of any new developments.
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: Y-Yes, ma'am!
attributes.name: Terrified Soldier

attributes.content: —Phew.
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: Well, this is easier than expected.
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: I thought it would be tougher.
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: No scruples. No acts to put up.
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: I found Victoria.
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: A red light flashes a few times in the deep shadows.
Isn't it your job to protect her?
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: Forty-three hours into the operation...
I knew you would come.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: ...Ulšulah.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: That mad bomber W came once to set up this prison.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Ines came twice to show 'compassion'. Same old Ines, always a tad slow with her retort when she's focused on someone else's shadow.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Now, it's you. What have you come to say?
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Have you thought it over?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: That's my line.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Your situation is perilous. Your only vehicle lies disabled.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: As the pilot, I'm very likely to know something that you don't, and probably am waiting for the right time to strike.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Really, you should kill me, Hoederer.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: I would rather you helped us with what you know.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: In your dreams.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: I already turned you down once. You give me too little credit if you think I would change my mind just because I'm a prisoner.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Three times.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: You saved our lives three times back in Kazdel. My life once, Ines's life twice.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You wrote all that in your diary?
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Name your price. I'll do my best to pay it.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You'll go bankrupt if you quit the mercenary life to open a business.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: I just want as many Sarkaz to make it back to Kazdel alive as possible.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Such grand ambitions.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: But enough chitchat. Let the old rules of Scar Market lie buried beneath Kazdel. Our debt is settled.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: One last warning, Hoederer. Kill me now, or you'll regret it.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Did it ever occur to you that we both want the same thing—
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Enough of your righteous crap.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Don't try to buy my life with your flowery words, old friend. They're not much better than money.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: A mercenary takes no sides. But you and I aren't really mercenaries anymore.
attributes.name: Ulšulah

attributes.content: Wanna bet, Ines?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hoederer's gonna try talking Ulšulah into helping for old time's sake at Scar Market. Ulšulah's gonna tell him to just get it over with, and Hoederer's gonna come back with a long face.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What's the wager?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: That's it? I figured you'd be jealous with the two of them all alone in a room together.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Stop trying to read my shadow, Ines. I'm not in the mood.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The bunny and the Victorian have been gone for a while... wonder how things are going out there.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Bonesy is still playing dead, and Theresis's Catastrophe refuses to go away. Who knows, maybe Manfred's gonna just pop out of nowhere.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I could have blown Theresis up right then and there!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I know you're restless because of Theresa, but hold that fuse for a moment. We have a lot of prep work to do.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: *Sarkaz swearing*! Who said I was—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We've got a problem, W...
attributes.name: W Squad Member

attributes.content: Out with it.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: It's time for a shift change, but not all our scouts came back.
attributes.name: W Squad Member

attributes.content: Crane's team went off to the north side of the canyon, and we can't reach them.
attributes.name: W Squad Member

attributes.content: Don't tell me they ran into a decent enemy caster.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: When was your last communication?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Almost three hours ago.
attributes.name: W Squad Member

attributes.content: If our enemy could make an entire merc squad disappear without a sound, they would've been on top of us by now.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: The most important thing to do at the moment is keep the Lifebone safe.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: We're just gonna sit here when we know something's going on outside?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I agree with Ines.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: We know nothing about this place. The safest course of action is to concentrate our forces.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Cut the crap. My men are missing. I want to know why.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: If they got lost, I'll bring them back. If somebody did them in, I'll return the favor.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Calm down! This could be a trap to split us up—
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I don't like playing defense. Even if it's a trap, I'll just blast them out of hiding.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Give me half a day. If I don't come back, that means I'm up against a real nasty piece of work. Don't come after me, get your defenses ready.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: If you get a call from Amiya, don't wait for me, just activate the Lifebone.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I'll take my own squad. No need to bother anyone else.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You lot. Grab your weapons and follow me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Is this where they went?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Should be. This cave was all we saw when we went north into the canyon. We don't know what's inside.
attributes.name: W Squad Member

attributes.content: Hidden passage? The court's secret cache?
attributes.name: W Squad Member

attributes.content: If this was a secret base of the Royal Court, we'd have had a couple hundred Vampires and Nachzehrers on our asses the moment we fell in here.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Based on Closure's intel, we're in the hills to the west of Londinium, a good distance from the main battlefield where those old farts are.
attributes.name: W
W
attributes.content: Somehow, though, I smell... (sniffs)

attributes.name: W
attributes.content: The old, moldy stench from someone who's been here for ages.
I don't like old stuff, but I'm sure Hoederer would love it.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Let me guess. What enemy did our lucky winners run into?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: W, when did you use your bombs?
attributes.name: W Squad Member

attributes.content: You delusional? Did you see me use them on our way here?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Then what are these burn marks on the wall?
attributes.name: W Squad Member

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Strange. No sign of Arts, but how do you leave marks like these on stone, then?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Did you hear that?!
attributes.name: W Squad Member

attributes.content: What is it this time?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: It's the sound of someone striking iron... there's somebody here!
attributes.name: W Squad Member

attributes.content: You're just hearing things.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Stop spooking yourself. Nobody's here.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Do we keep going, W? I have a bad feeling about this.
attributes.name: W Squad Member

attributes.content: Of course. Why do you think we're here?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: That's top-grade gear you all are using. I'm not rich enough to just let them rot in some cave.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Have you heard the Sarkaz legend... before Qui'lon was even born, the Sarkaz and a red dragon—
attributes.name: W Squad Member

attributes.content: Shut up.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: One historian in Hoederer is enough. Say anymore, and I'll throw you to the front—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: W Squad Member

attributes.content: Blood... but not Sarkaz.
attributes.name: W
W
attributes.content: It's fresh—

attributes.name: W
attributes.content: Get ready to fight!
*Roar*—!
